update.description:
SDF 1.4 changes:

- Added bullet sdf descriptions and merged in simbody sdf descriptions
- Implemented a generic SetParam function in BulletPhysics and ODEPhysics
- Enabled setting of bullet physics params through msgs
- Deprecated Physics's dt and update_rate params and replaced them by max_step_size and real_time_update_rate
- Updated GUI (ModelListWidget) to reflect the changes to Physics 

Still need to be done:

- Support setting real time factor (sdf description added but functionality not yet implemented) Ticketed issue #576

Update: Fix gz_log test that was broken by sdf 1.4

Update: Moved max_step_size and real_time_update_rate from world.sdf to physics.sdf

Update: Updated joint sdf description, add joint unit test

Update: Remove deprecated flags in physics.proto to get rid of build warnings
update.title: SDF 1.4

content.raw: deprecated flags removed and replaced by comments
content.html: deprecated flags removed and replaced by comments

content.raw: ya we still support these deprecated fields to maintain backward compatibility. Lets say we get rid of the deprecated flags in .proto file and just have the run time gzwarn messages?

content.raw: It looks like deprecating the dt and update_rate fields in physics.proto causes compiler warnings for any place we try to access them in the code: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64/30/warnings13Result/new/?

content.raw:
The pose tag here and in the child element below are new in sdf 1.4. These elements are currently specified as holding a value, but I don't think the element can hold a value as well as child elements. We should move the value of parent to a sub-element. For example:
~~~
<!-- in sdf 1.3 -->
<joint>
  <parent>upper_link</parent>
  <child>lower_link</child>
</joint>
~~~
would change to
~~~
<!-- in sdf 1.4 -->
<joint>
  <parent>
    <link_name>upper_link</link_name>
    <pose>1 2 3 4 5 6</pose>
  </parent>
  <child>
    <link_name>lower_link</link_name>
  </child>
</joint>
~~~
content.html:
The pose tag here and in the child element below are new in sdf 1.4. These elements are currently specified as holding a value, but I don't think the element can hold a value as well as child elements. We should move the value of parent to a sub-element. For example:

<!-- in sdf 1.3 -->
<joint>
  <parent>upper_link</parent>
  <child>lower_link</child>
</joint>

would change to

<!-- in sdf 1.4 -->
<joint>
  <parent>
    <link_name>upper_link</link_name>
    <pose>1 2 3 4 5 6</pose>
  </parent>
  <child>
    <link_name>lower_link</link_name>
  </child>
</joint>

- Deprecated Physics's dt and update_rate params and replaced them by max_step_size and real_time_update_rate
- Updated GUI (ModelListWidget) to reflect the changes to Physics 

Still need to be done:

- Support setting real time factor (sdf description added but functionality not yet implemented) Ticketed issue #576

Update: Fix gz_log test that was broken by sdf 1.4

Update: Moved max_step_size and real_time_update_rate from world.sdf to physics.sdf
